channel.title: Communities on zenoh - The Zero Overhead, Pub/Sub, Store, Query, and Compute Protocol.
channel.description: Recent content in Communities on zenoh - The Zero Overhead, Pub/Sub, Store, Query, and Compute Protocol.

item.title: Third-party crates
item.description: Currently the futures, zenoh-core, zenoh-service, and zenoh-proto crates provide the foundation for the Tokio ecosystem. There’s a growing set of crates outside of Tokio itself, however, filling in more functionality! zenoh-curl is an HTTP client library backed by the libcurl C library. zenoh-timer is a timer library providing finer-grained control over timers and helpful timeout facilities over the types in zenoh-core. zenoh-tls is a library for TLS streams backed by native-tls.
